Name: Cabin Depress
checklistText:
Cabin Depressurization

1.	Verify ECS Basic (Unstaged)

ECS Panel:
2.	PRESS REG A & B vlv - EGRESS

3.	CABIN REPRESS vlv - AUTO

4.	SUIT GAS DIVERTER vlv - PULL EFRESS

5.	CABIN GAS RETURN vlv - EGRESS

6.	Cabin relief & dump vlv (ovhd) - OPEN
	(applicable for docked vehicles only)

Remarks:
	Depressurizes docking tunnel during cabin depressurization.

Panel 11:
7.	CB ECS:		CABIN FAN - open
Remarks:
	Prevents activation of cabin fan in depressurized cabin.

Panel 16:
8.	CB ECS:		CABIN REPRESS - open

ECS Panel:
9.	Cabin relief & dump vlv (fwd or ovhd) - Cycle from AUTO
	to OPEN until cabin pressure is reduced to approx 3.2 psia
Remarks:
	Forward or overhead cabin relief and dump valve 
	may be used to depressurize cabin, if undocked (forward 
	only if docked).

10.	Cabin relief & dump vlv (fwd or ovhd) - AUTO

Panel 2:
11.	ECS:	SUIT PRESS ind - 3.6 to 4.3 psia
Remarks:
	During cabin depressurization, SUIT CIRCUIT RELIEF vlv 
	closes when ARS pressure drops to 4.3 psia. To verify 
	proper operation (closure) of valve, cabin pressure must
	be below 4.3 psia.

ECS Panel:
12.	Cabin relief & dump vlv (fwd or ovhd) - OPEN & reduce 
	cabin pressure to zero psia

Panel 16:
13.	CB ECS:	SUIT FLOW CONT - open (one man EVA only)

ECS Panel:
14.	Cabin relief & dump vlv (fwd) - AUTO 

15.	Cabin relief & dump vlv (ovhd) - AUTO 

16.	CABIN REPRESS vlv - CLOSE

Steps.Text: Docked? Cabin relief & dump vlv (OVHD) - OPEN
Leave in OPEN until cabin psia is reduced to approx 3.2 psia
ECS: SUIT PRESS ind - 3.6 to 4.3 psia
Leave in OPEN until cabin psia is reduced to 0.0 psia
set OVHD hatch cabin relief & vent valve to AUTO
